intro: Mesosphaerum crenatum, commonly known as the zigzag plant, is a flowering plant native to South Africa. It belongs to the family Apocynaceae and is characterized by its distinctive zigzagging stems. The plant produces small, clustered flowers that are typically white or pale yellow. Its leaves are opposite and have a slightly wavy or serrated edge. Mesosphaerum crenatum is often cultivated as an ornamental plant due to its unique appearance and adaptability to various growing conditions.
